data.text:
American Idol winner turns Tip Drill into House Wife

Staff Writer

2008-07-01

.bugnews.bloggieblog.com .

If you have not heard by now, Ruben Studdard got married. His new wife's name is Surata Zuri McCants. It appears McCants was in one of Nelly's video. Nelly is a platinum selling Hip Hop artist. Although Ruben claims to have met McCants at an album signing in Walmart and then later chased her down the toy section, McCants has been digging for gold for a min now according various Atlanta sources. She has allegedly been seen with the pro basketball team, pro football team, and any baller team. She is known in the baller world of girls in Atlanta.

McCants , whose current age is 30 something, was the alleged woman that started the BET video controversy awhile back. If you recall Nelly swiping the credit card down some chicks butt crack, McCants crack allegedly was that butt crack. Some females feel the role McCants played was a �hoeish� act. Although Studdard has not commented on the video, people may start asking him how he feels about it down the road. Being that Studdard is from Alabama one of America's biggest Bible belt states, McCants alleged acting like a credit card machine days are over. The people will keep her in line with prayer and , the prayer will make sure Studdard is the only guy swiping credit cards down her butt crack.
